e: ￹`Ma~`tala~ `ako~ `ko~ `kataynian~ `nira~ `a~ `romi'ad~.￺I can wait till the day he gets here.￻我可以等到他來的那一日
￹`O~ `nika~ `ta~`tala~ `ita~ `ko~ `nga'ay~.￺We should wait for each other.￻我們最好相互等待
￹`Hinatala~ `cingra~ `anini~.￺He is waiting expectantly.￻他正殷切期待，他正翹首企盼著
￹`Mi~`sitala~ `cingra~ `i~ `lalan~.￺He lay in wait on the road.￻他在路上埋伏
